column4: it is no problem for dualboot with Windows? I am going to buy a new notebook soon and they are all available with stupid windows only but it's too good (and to expensive!) for just formatting it. Can I resize the partition and put ubuntu on that laptop? or do I need to resize partitions via Windows or .. ?
if you want to dualboot windows and linux use wubi
i have yet to get grub working with a dualboot its too much of a pain the ass
windows likes to think its the only OS that exsists
